saratama kalin ara kellage homba thalanna one kollata boru keuanawata. eki hithan innne kauru keyalada danne nehe. oya dein oya kolla merum kewanam komada duka. e dukama ada anith demaupiyan widinawa. ada kale kiri bonna patan gann kale indanma kasadayak thama kara ganna dagakanne. igena ganna newe me demaupiyan me lamain geana hariyata hoyanne nedda. podi lamain maha aya wenna giyama oma wenawa. mekata seratama kalin kasadayak bandala denna oni.
